lexUnit.name: fight.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: Making an attempt to put a fire out with great effort. Usually attempted by official Firefighters.

sentence.text: More than 100 firefighters fought for four hours to bring the blaze under control .
Whether it is used for drinking , bathing , preparing food , cleaning , fighting fires or turning the wheels of industry -- we all take a readily available supply of water for granted today .
